import React, { useState } from 'react' const NewUnit = () => { const[state, setState] = useState({ name: "", size: "", price: "", image_url: "", status:"", }) const[check, setCheck] = useState(false) function onChange(e) { setState({...state, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } function handleChange(e) { if (e.target.checked) { console.log(true) } else { console.log(false) } setCheck(current => !current) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(state) } return (
); } export default NewUnit
